uk.ac.ebi.gxa.R
Interface AtlasRFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
BiocepAtlasRFactory, LocalAtlasRFactory, RemoteAtlasRFactory
public interface AtlasRFactory

A factory for generating RServices.

Author:
Tony Burdett

Method Summary
 org.kchine.r.server.RServices createRServices()
          Generates an RServices object that can be used to perform R calculations.
 void recycleRServices(org.kchine.r.server.RServices rServices)
          If the RServices object obtained needs to be shutdown, returned to a pool, or somehow destroyed any other way, this method handles that collection of resources.
 void releaseResources()
          Release any resources that may be held by this AtlasRFactory (for example, a pool of worker threads).

          Assertains whether the current R environment is valid, and can be used to acquire RServices objects.
 

Method Detail

validateEnvironment

boolean validateEnvironment()
                            throws AtlasRServicesException
Assertains whether the current R environment is valid, and can be used to acquire RServices objects. This will return false if the current R setup cannot be used, for example if a JNI bridge is missing in the case of a local R installation, or if required system properties or environment variables are absent. If validation checks pass and it appears that the R setup is sound, this will return true. An exception may be thrown when trying to access the underlying environment; the exception should always be wrapped and rethrown if this is the case.

Returns:
true if the R environment is correctly configured, false otherwise
Throws:
AtlasRServicesException - if the underlying environment throws an exception on initialization

createRServices

org.kchine.r.server.RServices createRServices()
                                              throws AtlasRServicesException
Generates an RServices object that can be used to perform R calculations.

Returns:
an RServices object, to which calculations can be submitted.
Throws:
AtlasRServicesException - if this factory cannot create RServices using default properties

recycleRServices

void recycleRServices(org.kchine.r.server.RServices rServices)
                      throws AtlasRServicesException
If the RServices object obtained needs to be shutdown, returned to a pool, or somehow destroyed any other way, this method handles that collection of resources.

Parameters:
rServices - the rServices object that has been finished with
Throws:
AtlasRServicesException - if this factory failed to recycle the RService for any reason

releaseResources

void releaseResources()
Release any resources that may be held by this AtlasRFactory (for example, a pool of worker threads).
